column2: Global Payments, Inc. engages in the provision of payment technology and software solutions. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia and currently employs 11,000 full-time employees. The firm provides payment and digital commerce solutions. The firm operates through three segments: North America, Europe and Asia-Pacific. The firm's segments primarily provide payment solutions for credit cards, debit cards, electronic payments and check-related services. The firm's segments target customers in various industries, including financial services, gaming, government, healthcare, professional services, restaurants, retail, universities, not-for-profit organizations and utilities. The company provides services across a range of channels to merchants and partners in over 30 countries throughout North America, Europe, the Asia-Pacific region and Brazil. The firm performs a series of services, including authorization, electronic draft capture, file transfers to facilitate funds settlement and certain exception-based, back office support services, such as chargeback and retrieval resolution.
